title: Data Scientist
description:
About the Company - Greetings from ValueLabs! ValueLabs is hiring for contractual role for Senior Data Scientist.




About the Role -

Exp: 5+ years

Location: Any (Remote Opportunity)

Duration: 3months

Primary Skills: Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Python, SQL, Time Series Analysis, Time Series Forecasting, Knowledge on Big data, Any Cloud







Responsibilities

Proficiency in programming languages: Python, SQL Strong exposure to Time Series Analysis & Time Series Forecasting in Data Science
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms and deep learning techniques
Familiarity with big data technologies: Hadoop, Spark
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Ability to work in an agile environment
Familiarity with data warehousing and ETL processes
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Familiarity with cloud-based platforms: AWS or Azure
Strong understanding of data governance and security best practices




Interested candidates can share cvs to sreelatha.g@valuelabs.com




Thanks & Regards

SreeLatha G

Senior Executive

ValueLabs
